other data sets for vaccination



```{r load school vaccination exemption data sets}
#2011 vaccination exemption data set
vaccexempt_2011 <- read.csv('http://projects.seattletimes.com/2015/fyiguy/school-vaccines/assets/school_exemption_data_all_schools_2011-12.csv')

#2013-2014 vaccination exemption data set
vaccexempt_2013to2014 <- read.socrata('https://data.kingcounty.gov/dataset/Vaccination-Exemptions-in-King-County/xs83-3zit')

#kindergarten MMR vacccine exemption data set
vaccexempt_kindmmr <- read.socrata('https://data.kingcounty.gov/dataset/Kindergarten-MMR-Vaccine-Coverage/kbfa-mvcb')

more <- read.socrata('https://data.kingcounty.gov/dataset/K-12-Immunization-Coverage-by-Most-Recent-School-R/h2ef-byuh')

evenmore <- read.socrata('https://data.kingcounty.gov/dataset/Kindergarten-Immunization-Coverage-by-Most-Recent-/agib-e23h')

yetmore <- read.socrata('https://data.kingcounty.gov/w/h2ef-byuh/shwn-npxw?cur=VVxMNDrQvgF&from=root#about')


```
